thread.title_full: Vintage Furniture Boutique Retail & Web Store

title: Vintage Furniture Boutique Retail & Web Store
text: Questions Business Summary This is a fabulous, well run, well established and exceedingly profitable business. Located in beautiful Palm Beach County, FL. This is a outstanding opportunity to purchase a well branded retail and online store. Facilities include 5000 sq. ft. warehouse and showroom with A/C. Ideal monthly lease & terms and a very amiable landlord. Termed a vintage furniture boutique, with lines of Lucite, Pagodas, Faux Bamboo and Hollywood Regency this business is poised for rapid growth or remain a medium sized easily run profitable business. Last 4 years of income sales and profits speak volumes for the quality operation the owners have put in place. Numerous feature write-ups in magazines like Architectural Digest, Coastal Living, Beautiful Homes and others along with a contact list of ''A-Lister's'' to die for is available for the right buyer. Lender pre-screened with $425,000 down. Selling Price: $1,250,000 For more information, please contact Russell Cohen @ 954-900-2685. Financials
